# TheInvisibleCharacter.live - Invisible Character Generator

TheInvisibleCharacter.live is a professional online platform specializing in zero-width character processing. We provide simple, efficient, and professional invisible character generation and management services for social media enthusiasts, gamers, and creative professionals worldwide.

## Key Features
- 12 types of Unicode invisible characters
- Real-time character detection
- Multi-language support (English/French)
- Mobile-responsive design
- Privacy-focused (no registration required)
- 100% free to use

## Main Tools
- Character Generator: Create various types of invisible characters
- Character Detector: Find and analyze invisible characters in text
- Character Converter: Convert between regular and invisible characters

## Popular Use Cases
- Instagram bios and captions
- Fortnite invisible names
- WhatsApp invisible messages
- TikTok profiles
- Social media optimization
- Creative text formatting

## Technical Details
- Built with HTML5, Tailwind CSS, and vanilla JavaScript
- Cloudflare Pages deployment ready
- SEO optimized with structured data
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Dark/light theme support
- Accessibility compliant (WCAG 2.1)

## Language Support
- English: https://theinvisiblecharacter.live/
- French: https://theinvisiblecharacter.live/index-fr.html

## Legal & Privacy
- Privacy Policy: https://theinvisiblecharacter.live/privacy-policy.html
- Terms of Service: https://theinvisiblecharacter.live/terms-of-service.html
- No user data collection or tracking
- GDPR compliant

## Contact
- Website: https://theinvisiblecharacter.live
- Support: Available through help center
